chapter.title: Trade Services
chapter.para:
The Trade Services menu on the toolbar, provides facilities to manage trade instruments through .
The availability of the Trade Services menu and its functions is dependent on the permissions assigned to the user. The menu displays only those functions that the user is authorised to use.

List of options available under the menu are:
Import Letter of Credit
Create and manage Import Letters of credit.
Export Letter of Credit
Create and manage Export Letters of credit.
Import Collection
Manage Import Collections.
Export Collection
Create and manage Export Collections.
Undertaking Issued
Create and manage Undertaking Issued.
Undertaking Advised
Create and manage Undertaking Advised.
Financing Request
Create and manage Financing Requests.
Shipping Guarantee
Create and manage Shipping Guarantees.
Issued Standby LC
Create and manage Issued Standby Letters of Credit.
Received Standby LC
Create and manage Received Standby Letters of Credit.
Inward Remittance
Receive incoming notifications of remittances and do correspondence with the bank.
Funds Transfers
Request for funds transfer.
Letter of Indemnity
Create and manage Letters of Indemnity.

section.title: Common Functionalities across Trade Products
section.para: This section lists features that are common across all the Trade Products.

section.title: Sorting Feature
section.para:
The sorting feature enables you to sort the listing data on each of product screens like ILC, ELC, EC and more. You can sort the listed data in ascending or descending order for any of the listed columns. The sorting icon
is displayed only when the cursor is hovered over the column icon. The upward arrow performs ascending order sort and downward arrow performs descending order sort.

section.title: Go To Page Feature
section.para:
The Go To Page feature enables you to navigate to the desired page directly instead of navigating through the list. The Go To icon
at the bottom of the product listing page displays a text box where you can enter the page number you wish to navigate to.

section.title: Column Customization Feature
section.para: The column customization feature enables you to customize the listed columns without having saved a filter preference from Advanced filter option. This feature is controlled through a property enable.column.cust, set this property to 'True' to customize columns without saving filter preferences.
The column customization is applicable only to the tab on which the customization is done and not on any other tabs. The column preference chosen through customization is saved for logged in user.
